The clan that lives here has developed the ability to evolve their pets into special forms. Evolution is only possible when the pet is summoned. Also, since the process transfers the experience value, evolving a high level pet might actually result in a decrease in the pet's level.
Any items in the pet's inventory will be transferred to the owner's inventory.
Which pet do you want to evolve?

Evolve Great Wolf into Great Snow Wolf for 20,000,000 Adena
Evolve Fenrir into Snow Fenrir for 30,000,000 Adena
Evolve Wind Strider into a Red Dragon Bugle of Wind for 15,000,000 Adena
Evolve Star Strider into a Red Dragon Bugle of Star for 15,000,000 Adena
Evolve Twilight Strider into a Red Dragon Bugle of Twilight for 15,000,000 Adena
